card.name: Terror Pit
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Ballom, Master of Death
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Demon Commands. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures except darkness creatures. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Dorballom, Lord of Demons
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Demon Commands. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature, destroy all creatures except darkness creatures. Then each player puts all non-darkness cards in their mana zone into their graveyard.

card.name: Ballom Monarch, Lord of Dark Reapers
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Demon Commands or creatures that has "Reaper" in its Card Name ■ Whenever one of your Demon Commands or creatures that have "Reaper" in its Card Name ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Olzekia, General of Decapitation
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses 2 of their creatures and destroys them.

card.name: Deathraios, Cursed Blade Reaper
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures that has "Reaper" in its name. If you do, your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

card.name: Sanctuary of the Mother
card.text: ■ Put one of your non-evolution creatures in the battle zone into your mana zone. If you do, choose an evolution creature in your mana zone that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone.

card.name: Hanzou, Menacing Phantom
card.text: ■ Ninja Strike ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -6000 power until the End Step ■ When this creature would be destroyed and you have at least one darkness card in your mana zone, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard instead.

card.name: Shrine of Rebirth
card.text: ■ Put up to 2 cards from your graveyard into your mana zone.

card.name: Triple Mouth, Decaying Savage
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.

card.name: Jasmine, Mist Faerie
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Death Gate, Gate of Hell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Dark Life
card.text: ■ Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your mana zone, and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Ballom Ross, Lord of Demons
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Demon Commands. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures except for darkness creatures. Then each player reveals their hand and discards all non-darkness cards from it.

card.name: Bell Hell De Skull, Moon Reaper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a card from your mana zone or graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Hexpain, Invincible Reaper
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add one to your hand, put one into your graveyard, and put one into your mana zone.

card.name: Ballom Quake, Lord of Demons
card.text: ■ Mana evolution: Choose a Demon Command in your mana zone and put this creature on top of that creature. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature, destroy all creatures except Demon Commands. ■ Whenever your opponent would put a creature For No Cost
